1: You turn off the flashlight. You don't see a thing anymore.
2: You turn on the flashlight. The beam lights up your surroundings.
3: It won't work without new batteries...
4: The light of the flashlight starts to dim.
5: The batteries in the flaslight are depleted. Slowly, it goes out.

0: You strike with your sword, but the monster dodges it.
1: You strike with your sword and you hit the monster hard.
2: The monster is badly injured and you're soaked with its blood.
3: You can strike again. Do you want to? [y/n]
4: I didn't catch that. Please answer with y or n.

0: Your pockets are filled to the brim and you can't fit {item} in them.
1: You pick up {item} and put it in one of your pockets.
2: You pick up {item} and put it on.

3: You don't see any "{param}" that you can pick up.

5: It's pitch black and you can't see your hand in front of your face.
6: Around you, you see the smoldering remains of what used to be a forest.
9: Bathing in your own blood, you succumb to your injuries. While you're gasping for air on the ground, you hear loud laughter from a distance.
Then your eyes close and your heart stops beating.
At the same time, the bomb explodes and the earth dies with you.
